channel.title: Potential Jagex Acquisition from a Chinese Iron Mining Conglomerate
channel.description:
You heard it first, folks, Jagex has been offered 300 million to sell out to a chinese iron mining firm.
http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/forums.ws?14,15,354,65764827,goto,1
WeabooScape here we come!

item.title: Potential Jagex Acquisition from a Chinese Iron Mining Conglomerate
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

actually this is all a part of my plan, saved up millions to open a chinese mining company to buy Jagex after sabotaging them for bankruptcy, and ruining rs, therefore the player base would flood to private servers and I would take advantage of the overflow and finally open the Hagoscape server to the public and become the #1 private server

Read full topic
item.source: Potential Jagex Acquisition from a Chinese Iron Mining Conglomerate

item.title: Potential Jagex Acquisition from a Chinese Iron Mining Conglomerate
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:5, topic:554983”]http://imgur.com/QaSWZC5 relevant

also this is what we need to bring back the private server scene boys, if the chinese tear this game apart (Which I unfortunately think they will with their shit p2w) then moparscape will rise to glory again then davidi2 and tomscape beta can have purpose once more[/quote]

I had a similar thought with the Darkscape shutdown, but there’s no motion in this community and idek what to do myself

Read full topic

item.title: Potential Jagex Acquisition from a Chinese Iron Mining Conglomerate
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:3, topic:554983”]I get kids still play the game but why any company would think of investing in jagex is just beyond me

Asia has some of the best MMO’s out there (and some exclusive MMO’s, think of Monster Hunter Online) so why invest in this outdated, dead, overraped, milked out piece of shit game/company?[/quote]maybe the sweaty ballsack chinese investors don’t know that?

Read full topic
